title: Matt Fitzpatrick Talks About Life After Winning a Golf Major
description: Having won the U.S. Open in June, Fitzpatrick could triumph at the BMW PGA Championship.
dc:creator: Michael Arkush
media:credit: Aaron Doster/USA Today Sports via Reuters
media:description: Moments after Matt Fitzpatrick, who was 27 years old at the time, won the U.S. Open golf tournament in June by one stroke.
